text: Santi bhikkhave bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti evarūpāpi bhikkhave santi bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe
edit: Santi bhikkhave bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti – evarūpāpi bhikkhave santi bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe

translations.transtext: Monks, there are monks in this group, [who] live, engaging in the development of the four foundations of mindfulness. Monks, there are such monks also in this group.
